product_name: Merrell Ascend Glove Gore-Tex Trail-Running Shoes - Women's
long_description: The minimalist Merrell Ascend Glove Gore-Tex(R) Trail-Running shoes feature a zero drop with a light layer of cushioning for barefoot-inspired performance. Synthetic leather and mesh uppers create tough yet flexible and breathable barriers around your feet; mesh linings are breathable and help wick moisture away. Gore-Tex ConnectFit delivers an amazing glovelike fit with exceptional breathability and waterproof performance. Rubber toe bumpers and TrailProtect shock absorption pads in the forefoot and heel guard against uncomfortable impacts when you're off-road. 6mm thick EVA midsoles provide cushioning to make outdoor adventures easy on your feet; please note, there is a 0mm heel to midfoot drop to encourage a natural running stride. Merrell Ascend Glove shoes have nonmarking Vibram outoles with a versatile tread pattern for excellent grip and durability.
short_description: The minimalist Merrell Ascend Glove Gore-Tex(R) Trail-Running shoes feature a zero drop with a light layer of cushioning for barefoot-inspired performance.
